It's funny. Whenever I drive past a cemetery with a car load of kids I tell=
 them to look out in the cemetery and see if they see people. A few will sa=
y yes! Then I ask them to tell me which ones are ghosts.
=A0
LOL
=A0
Frank =
R.

Yes, you April...tee hee...
Interesting!
We have had severa=
l interactions with Spirits. Completely visual and fully normal looking. Co=
mplete discussions, didn't know that they were even daid for some weeks lat=
er. That's when the messages were delivered and the recipient had to sit do=
wn and think those through. 
Al

You mean me, April??
=A0
Yes and no. It was more of a shado=
w person, except it was 3D and just head, torso and partial arms. It hovere=
d in front of my husband and I for a few seconds (we both saw it), then it =
turned and popped outside the apartment door. I say popped because it made =
an audible "pop" and the apartment shook as it went out.
=A0
I am of the op=
inion that it was not human.
=A0

e with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP in real =
time.
=A0
I=A0took part in=A0an investigation of Ashmore Estates, near Ashm=
ore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set up in the three hal=
ls of the building. The video for all=A0was being monitored and recorded=A0=
at a central location. Alas, we did not have microphones at the camera site=
s conected to the central location. I wonder what we might have heard if we=
 did?
=A0
Zack
